
            <h1 class="postTitle">
                <a id="cb_post_title_url" class="postTitle2 vertical-middle" href="https://www.cnblogs.com/code-daily/p/18860998" title="发布于 2025-05-06 09:57">
    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">.NET 原生驾驭 AI 新基建实战系列（六）：Pinecone ── 托管向量数据库的向量数据库的云原生先锋</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body blogpost-body-html">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">引言</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">随着人工智能和机器学习技术的快速发展，向量数据在许多应用场景中变得越来越重要。从推荐系统到自然语言处理，再到图像搜索，向量搜索技术成为实现高效、精准匹配的核心。Pinecone 作为一个托管的向量数据库，为开发者提供了一种简单而强大的解决方案，能够高效地存储和查询高维向量数据。与此同时，微软的开源项目 Semantic Kernel 将 Pinecone 集成到其生态系统中，进一步增强了开发者构建智能应用的能力。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">本文将深入介绍 Pinecone 的背景、特点及其优势，并结合 GitHub 上 Semantic Kernel 的单元测试文件 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">PineconeMemoryStoreTests.cs</code>，详细讲解 Pinecone 在 Semantic Kernel 中的集成和使用方法。</p>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">Pinecone 的背景和特点</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">什么是 Pinecone？</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Pinecone 是一个云原生的托管向量数据库，专为存储和查询高维向量数据而设计。它由 Pinecone 公司开发，旨在解决传统数据库在处理向量数据时的性能瓶颈问题。通过提供高效的相似性搜索功能，Pinecone 被广泛应用于机器学习和人工智能领域，尤其是需要快速匹配和检索的场景。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">Pinecone 的核心特点</span></h3>
<ol style="list-style-type: decimal; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">高性能相似性搜索</strong><br>Pinecone 采用先进的索引技术（如近似最近邻搜索 ANN），能够在海量高维向量数据中快速找到与查询向量最相似的结果。这种能力使其在实时应用中表现出色。</p>


</li>
<li>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">托管服务</strong><br>作为一种完全托管的云服务，Pinecone 负责数据库的维护、扩展和安全性，开发者无需自行管理底层基础设施。这大大降低了开发和运维的复杂性。</p>


</li>
<li>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">易用性</strong><br>Pinecone 提供了直观的 API 和多种语言的 SDK（如 Python、C#、Java），开发者可以通过几行代码完成向量的插入和查询操作。</p>


</li>
<li>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">可扩展性</strong><br>Pinecone 支持水平扩展，能够根据数据量和查询负载动态调整资源，确保在高并发场景下的稳定性和性能。</p>


</li>
<li>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">灵活性</strong><br>Pinecone 支持多种距离度量方式（如余弦相似度、欧几里得距离），并允许附加元数据到向量上，增强了数据管理的灵活性。</p>


</li>

</ol><hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">Pinecone的核心原理与运行机制</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Pinecone 是一个托管的向量数据库，专为高效存储和查询高维向量数据而设计。其核心原理和运行机制主要围绕 <strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">向量索引</strong>、<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">相似性搜索</strong> 和 <strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">云原生架构</strong> 展开。</p>

<img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/365286/202505/365286-20250506095815919-422591742.png" alt="" style="display: block; max-width: 100%; border-radius: 8px; object-fit: fill; box-shadow: 2px 4px 8px rgba(153, 153, 153, 1); border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); margin: 0 auto">
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">1. 向量索引</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Pinecone 的核心在于其 <strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">向量索引技术</strong>，这是一种针对高维向量数据优化的数据结构，能够在海量数据中快速执行相似性搜索。其底层主要基于 <strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">近似最近邻（ANN）算法</strong>，在保证较高精度的同时显著提升搜索速度。</p>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">1.1 近似最近邻（ANN）搜索</span></h4>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">原理</strong>：ANN 算法通过牺牲部分精确度换取更快的搜索速度。在高维空间中，精确的最近邻搜索（KNN）计算量巨大，而 ANN 通过构建特殊索引结构（如树结构、图结构或哈希表），将搜索空间划分为更小的区域，快速定位相似向量。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">常用技术</strong>：
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">树结构</strong>：如 KD 树或 Ball 树，通过递归划分空间。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">图结构</strong>：如 HNSW（层次可导航小世界图），通过多层图实现高效导航。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">哈希技术</strong>：如局部敏感哈希（LSH），将相似向量映射到相同桶中。
</li>

</ul>


</li>

</ul>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">1.2 索引构建</span></h4>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">过程</strong>：<ol style="list-style-type: decimal; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">数据采样</strong>：从数据集中采样，估计数据分布。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">参数调整</strong>：根据分布调整索引参数（如树的深度、图的连接数）。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">索引训练</strong>：利用采样数据训练索引模型。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">批量插入</strong>：将所有向量数据插入索引。
</li>

</ol>

</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">自动化</strong>：用户只需指定向量维度和距离度量方式（如余弦相似度、欧几里得距离），Pinecone 会自动选择合适的算法和参数。
</li>

</ul>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">2. 相似性搜索</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">相似性搜索</strong> 是 Pinecone 的核心功能，用于快速找到与查询向量最相似的向量。</p>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">2.1 查询处理</span></h4>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">步骤</strong>：<ol style="list-style-type: decimal; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">预处理</strong>：对查询向量进行归一化（若使用余弦相似度）。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">索引搜索</strong>：利用索引结构定位候选向量。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">精排</strong>：对候选向量进行精确距离计算，返回 topK 结果。
</li>

</ol>

</li>

</ul>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">2.2 距离度量</span></h4>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">支持类型</strong>：
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">余弦相似度</strong>：适用于文本和推荐系统。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">欧几里得距离</strong>：适用于图像和音频特征。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">点积</strong>：某些场景下的相似度度量。
</li>

</ul>


</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">选择</strong>：用户创建索引时指定度量方式，Pinecone 据此优化索引。
</li>

</ul>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">3. 云原生架构</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Pinecone 是一个完全托管的云服务，其架构设计注重 <strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">可扩展性</strong>、<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">高可用性</strong> 和 <strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">安全性</strong>。</p>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">3.1 分布式系统</span></h4>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">数据分片</strong>：将索引数据分布在多个节点上。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">负载均衡</strong>：自动分配查询请求，平衡负载。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">故障恢复</strong>：通过数据冗余和自动 failover 保证高可用性。
</li>

</ul>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">3.2 自动扩展</span></h4>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">水平扩展</strong>：增加节点数量提升处理能力。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">垂直扩展</strong>：升级节点配置提高单节点性能。
</li>

</ul>
<h4 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 18px; color: rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: inline-block; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 2px solid rgba(245, 172, 7, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 2px 10px; margin: 0">3.3 安全性</span></h4>
<ul style="list-style-type: disc; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">数据加密</strong>：传输和存储时加密数据。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">访问控制</strong>：通过 API 密钥和 IAM 策略管理权限。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">合规性</strong>：符合 GDPR、HIPAA 等标准。
</li>

</ul>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">Pinecone 在 Semantic Kernel 中的集成</span></h2>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">什么是 Semantic Kernel？</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Semantic Kernel 是微软推出的一款开源框架，旨在帮助开发者轻松集成大型语言模型（LLM）和其他 AI 技术到应用程序中。它提供了一套工具和 API，支持开发者创建智能代理、处理语义记忆以及实现复杂的功能编排。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在 Semantic Kernel 中，内存存储（Memory Store）是一个关键组件，用于存储和管理语义数据（如文本嵌入向量）。Pinecone 作为一种高效的向量数据库，被集成到 Semantic Kernel 中，通过 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">PineconeMemoryStore</code> 类实现。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">PineconeMemoryStore 的作用</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">PineconeMemoryStore</code> 是 Semantic Kernel 中的一个具体实现类，遵循 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">IMemoryStore</code> 接口。它将 Pinecone 的向量存储和查询能力与 Semantic Kernel 的语义记忆功能结合在一起。开发者可以通过这个类将生成的向量嵌入存储到 Pinecone 中，并在需要时执行高效的相似性搜索。</p>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">以下是 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">PineconeMemoryStore</code> 在 Semantic Kernel 中的典型工作流程：</p>
<ol style="list-style-type: decimal; color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0 0 0 25px; margin: 8px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">向量生成</strong>：通过嵌入模型（如 OpenAI 的 embeddings）将文本转换为向量。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">存储向量</strong>：使用 <code style="background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">PineconeMemoryStore</code> 将向量上传到 Pinecone 索引。
</li>
<li>
<strong style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-weight: bold; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 0; border: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 0">查询向量</strong>：根据输入查询，检索与目标向量最相似的记忆。
</li>

</ol>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">从单元测试看集成细节</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">我们可以参考 Semantic Kernel 的 GitHub 仓库中的 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">PineconeMemoryStoreTests.cs</code> 文件，了解 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">PineconeMemoryStore</code> 的具体实现和功能。这个单元测试文件包含了多个测试用例，用于验证类的正确性。以下是一个简化的测试用例示例：</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>using&nbsp;Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.Pinecone;
using&nbsp;Xunit;

public&nbsp;class&nbsp;PineconeMemoryStoreTests
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;[Fact]
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;public&nbsp;async&nbsp;Task&nbsp;CanStoreAndRetrieveMemoryAsync()
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;//&nbsp;Arrange
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;var&nbsp;pineconeClient&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;PineconeClient("your-api-key",&nbsp;"your-environment");
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;var&nbsp;memoryStore&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;PineconeMemoryStore(pineconeClient,&nbsp;"test-index");
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;var&nbsp;collection&nbsp;=&nbsp;"test-collection";
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;var&nbsp;key&nbsp;=&nbsp;"test-key";
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;var&nbsp;value&nbsp;=&nbsp;"This&nbsp;is&nbsp;a&nbsp;test&nbsp;memory";

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;//&nbsp;Act
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;await&nbsp;memoryStore.SaveAsync(collection,&nbsp;key,&nbsp;value);
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;var&nbsp;result&nbsp;=&nbsp;await&nbsp;memoryStore.GetAsync(collection,&nbsp;key);

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;//&nbsp;Assert
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Assert.NotNull(result);
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Assert.Equal(value,&nbsp;result.Value);
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
}</code></pre>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">这个测试用例展示了如何使用 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">PineconeMemoryStore</code> 存储和检索记忆数据。通过分析测试代码，我们可以看到 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">PineconeMemoryStore</code> 提供了简单的接口，同时依赖底层的 <code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">PineconeClient</code> 与 Pinecone 服务交互。</p>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">Pinecone 的使用方法</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">为了让读者更好地掌握 Pinecone 的使用方法，本节将通过详细的代码示例，展示如何在 Semantic Kernel 中操作 Pinecone。以下示例基于 C# 语言和 Semantic Kernel 的集成。</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">1. 配置 Pinecone 客户端</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在使用 Pinecone 之前，需要初始化一个客户端实例，并提供 API 密钥和环境信息。</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>using&nbsp;Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.Pinecone;

var&nbsp;pineconeClient&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;PineconeClient(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;apiKey:&nbsp;"your-api-key",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;environment:&nbsp;"your-environment"&nbsp;&nbsp;//&nbsp;例如&nbsp;"us-west1-gcp"
);</code></pre>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">2. 创建索引</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">索引是 Pinecone 中存储向量的容器。创建索引时，需要指定名称、维度和距离度量方式。</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>//&nbsp;创建索引，维度为&nbsp;1536（常见于&nbsp;OpenAI&nbsp;的&nbsp;embeddings）
await&nbsp;pineconeClient.CreateIndexAsync(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;indexName:&nbsp;"my-index",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;dimension:&nbsp;1536,
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;metric:&nbsp;Metric.Cosine&nbsp;&nbsp;//&nbsp;使用余弦相似度
);</code></pre>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">3. 插入向量数据</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">假设我们有一个文本列表，需要将其转换为向量并存储到 Pinecone 中。</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>//&nbsp;定义向量数据
var&nbsp;vectors&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;List&lt;Vector&gt;
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;new&nbsp;Vector
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Id&nbsp;=&nbsp;"doc1",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Values&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;float[]&nbsp;{&nbsp;0.1f,&nbsp;0.2f,&nbsp;0.3f&nbsp;/*&nbsp;1536&nbsp;个值&nbsp;*/&nbsp;},
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Metadata&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;Dictionary&lt;string,&nbsp;object&gt;&nbsp;{&nbsp;{&nbsp;"text",&nbsp;"Hello&nbsp;world"&nbsp;}&nbsp;}
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;},
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;new&nbsp;Vector
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Id&nbsp;=&nbsp;"doc2",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Values&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;float[]&nbsp;{&nbsp;0.4f,&nbsp;0.5f,&nbsp;0.6f&nbsp;/*&nbsp;1536&nbsp;个值&nbsp;*/&nbsp;},
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Metadata&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;Dictionary&lt;string,&nbsp;object&gt;&nbsp;{&nbsp;{&nbsp;"text",&nbsp;"Pinecone&nbsp;test"&nbsp;}&nbsp;}
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
};

//&nbsp;插入向量
await&nbsp;pineconeClient.UpsertAsync("my-index",&nbsp;vectors);</code></pre>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">4. 查询相似向量</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">查询时，需要提供一个查询向量，并指定返回的结果数量（topK）。</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>//&nbsp;查询向量
var&nbsp;queryVector&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;float[]&nbsp;{&nbsp;0.1f,&nbsp;0.2f,&nbsp;0.3f&nbsp;/*&nbsp;1536&nbsp;个值&nbsp;*/&nbsp;};
var&nbsp;results&nbsp;=&nbsp;await&nbsp;pineconeClient.QueryAsync(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;indexName:&nbsp;"my-index",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;vector:&nbsp;queryVector,
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;topK:&nbsp;5
);

//&nbsp;输出结果
foreach&nbsp;(var&nbsp;result&nbsp;in&nbsp;results)
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Console.WriteLine($"ID:&nbsp;{result.Id},&nbsp;Score:&nbsp;{result.Score}");
}</code></pre>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">5. 在 Semantic Kernel 中使用 PineconeMemoryStore</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">以下是一个完整的示例，展示如何将 Pinecone 集成到 Semantic Kernel 中，并执行记忆存储和搜索。</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>using&nbsp;Microsoft.SemanticKernel;
using&nbsp;Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Memory;
using&nbsp;Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.Pinecone;

class&nbsp;Program
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;static&nbsp;async&nbsp;Task&nbsp;Main(string[]&nbsp;args)
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;//&nbsp;初始化&nbsp;Pinecone&nbsp;客户端
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;var&nbsp;pineconeClient&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;PineconeClient("your-api-key",&nbsp;"your-environment");
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;var&nbsp;memoryStore&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;PineconeMemoryStore(pineconeClient,&nbsp;"my-index");

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;//&nbsp;创建&nbsp;Semantic&nbsp;Kernel&nbsp;实例
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;var&nbsp;kernel&nbsp;=&nbsp;Kernel.CreateBuilder()
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;.AddMemoryStore(memoryStore)
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;.Build();

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;//&nbsp;保存记忆
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;await&nbsp;kernel.Memory.SaveAsync(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;collection:&nbsp;"my-collection",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;key:&nbsp;"doc1",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;value:&nbsp;"Hello&nbsp;world",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;description:&nbsp;"A&nbsp;simple&nbsp;greeting"
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;);

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;//&nbsp;搜索记忆
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;var&nbsp;searchResults&nbsp;=&nbsp;await&nbsp;kernel.Memory.SearchAsync(
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;collection:&nbsp;"my-collection",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;query:&nbsp;"Hello",
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;limit:&nbsp;5
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;);

&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;//&nbsp;输出搜索结果
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;foreach&nbsp;(var&nbsp;result&nbsp;in&nbsp;searchResults)
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Console.WriteLine($"Key:&nbsp;{result.Key},&nbsp;Relevance:&nbsp;{result.Relevance}");
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;}
}</code></pre>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在这个示例中，<code style="color: rgba(53, 148, 247, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(27, 31, 35, 0.05); width: auto; height: auto; border-radius: 4px; overflow-wrap: break-word; font-family: &quot;Operator Mono&quot;, Consolas, Monaco, Menlo, monospace; word-break: break-all; border-top: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 2px 4px; margin: 0 2px">PineconeMemoryStore</code> 作为内存存储后端，Semantic Kernel 会自动将文本转换为向量并存储到 Pinecone 中，搜索时也会利用 Pinecone 的相似性匹配功能。</p>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">实际应用场景</span></h2>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">Pinecone 和 Semantic Kernel 的结合为多种实际应用提供了强大的支持。以下是一些典型场景：</p>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">1. 推荐系统</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在推荐系统中，可以将用户行为数据和物品特征转换为向量，存储在 Pinecone 中。通过查询与用户向量最相似的物品向量，实现个性化的推荐。</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>//&nbsp;假设用户向量和物品向量已生成
var&nbsp;userVector&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;float[]&nbsp;{&nbsp;0.1f,&nbsp;0.2f,&nbsp;0.3f&nbsp;/*&nbsp;1536&nbsp;个值&nbsp;*/&nbsp;};
var&nbsp;results&nbsp;=&nbsp;await&nbsp;pineconeClient.QueryAsync("items-index",&nbsp;userVector,&nbsp;topK:&nbsp;10);
Console.WriteLine("推荐的物品：");
foreach&nbsp;(var&nbsp;result&nbsp;in&nbsp;results)
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Console.WriteLine($"物品&nbsp;ID:&nbsp;{result.Id},&nbsp;相似度:&nbsp;{result.Score}");
}</code></pre>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">2. 语义搜索</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">在文档管理系统中，可以将文档内容转换为向量，存储在 Pinecone 中，实现基于语义的搜索。</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>//&nbsp;搜索与查询“人工智能”最相关的文档
var&nbsp;queryVector&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;float[]&nbsp;{&nbsp;0.4f,&nbsp;0.5f,&nbsp;0.6f&nbsp;/*&nbsp;1536&nbsp;个值&nbsp;*/&nbsp;};
var&nbsp;results&nbsp;=&nbsp;await&nbsp;pineconeClient.QueryAsync("docs-index",&nbsp;queryVector,&nbsp;topK:&nbsp;5);
foreach&nbsp;(var&nbsp;result&nbsp;in&nbsp;results)
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Console.WriteLine($"文档&nbsp;ID:&nbsp;{result.Id},&nbsp;相似度:&nbsp;{result.Score}");
}</code></pre>
<h3 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: block; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; border-top: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-right: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); border-bottom: 4px solid rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); border-left: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1); padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 20px; color: rgba(64, 184, 250, 1); line-height: 1.5em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; font-weight: bold; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 0 25px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">3. 图像搜索</span></h3>
<p style="color: rgba(43, 43, 43, 1); font-size: 14px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0.02em; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; padding: 8px 0; margin: 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">将图像特征提取为向量后，可以利用 Pinecone 实现基于内容的图像搜索。</p>
<pre class="custom highlighter-hljs" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><code>//&nbsp;查询与目标图像相似的图像
var&nbsp;imageVector&nbsp;=&nbsp;new&nbsp;float[]&nbsp;{&nbsp;0.7f,&nbsp;0.8f,&nbsp;0.9f&nbsp;/*&nbsp;特征向量&nbsp;*/&nbsp;};
var&nbsp;results&nbsp;=&nbsp;await&nbsp;pineconeClient.QueryAsync("images-index",&nbsp;imageVector,&nbsp;topK:&nbsp;3);
foreach&nbsp;(var&nbsp;result&nbsp;in&nbsp;results)
{
&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;Console.WriteLine($"图像&nbsp;ID:&nbsp;{result.Id},&nbsp;相似度:&nbsp;{result.Score}");
}</code></pre>
<hr style="border-radius: 0; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); width: auto; height: 1px; border-top: 2px solid rgba(59, 170, 250, 1); border-right: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-bottom: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); border-left: 3px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4); padding: 0; margin: 10px 0" data-tool="mdnice编辑器">
<h2 style="align-items: unset; background: none left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; display: flex; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: center; line-height: 1.5em; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0; margin: 30px 0 15px; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)" data-tool="mdnice编辑器"><span class="content" style="font-size: 22px; line-height: 1.8em; letter-spacing: 0; align-items: unset; background: linear-gradient(0deg, rgba(231, 247, 252, 1) 40%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 40%) left top / auto no-repeat scroll padding-box border-box rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); border-radius: 0; box-shadow: none; color: rgba(112, 188, 234, 1); display: block; font-weight: bold; font-style: normal; flex-direction: unset; float: unset; height: auto; justify-content: unset; overflow-x: unset; overflow-y: unset; position: relative; text-align: left; text-indent: 0; text-shadow: none; transform: none; width: auto; -webkit-box-reflect: unset; padding: 0 10px 0 0; margin: 0; border: 1px none rgba(0, 0, 0, 1)">性能与可扩展性</span></h2>
